testsuite.name: 31 - I should be able to restart failed/paused pipelines (pipeline details modal)

testcase.name: 31 - I should be able to restart failed/paused pipelines (pipeline details modal) LM-31-1 Should not restart a paused pipeline

testcase.name: 31 - I should be able to restart failed/paused pipelines (pipeline details modal) LM-31-2 Should restart a killed pipeline
